feed.title: Lorsalio - Wallpapers, Icons, Patterns
feed.subtitle: Free downloads, wallpapers, patterns, icons. The wallpapers are created in high resolution 4K and adapted for different mobile devices. Icons are designed primarily for the Windows OS, but may be suitable for other OS. Patterns can be used in your commercial work.
